record.source: BMC medical informatics and decision making
record.title: Machine learning based model for the early detection of Gestational Diabetes Mellitus.
record.subjects: Diabetes, Gestational diagnosis ; Diabetes, Gestational blood ; Machine Learning ; Early Diagnosis ; Humans ; Female ; Pregnancy ; Adult ; Biomarkers blood ; Pregnancy Trimester, First blood ; Pregnancy Trimester, Second blood
record.abstract: Declarations. Ethics approval and consent to participate: The ethical aspect of study protocol was approved by IRB committee of QBB according to the guidelines of the Ministry of Public Health (MoPH), Qatar. For all the adult participants informed consent was obtained from all subjects by QBB. he study sample was obtained from QBB in accordance with the principles outlined in the Declaration of Helsinki. Consent for publication: Not applicable. Competing interests: The authors declare no competing interests.
record.contributors: Zaky, Hesham ; Fthenou, Eleni ; Srour, Luma ; Farrell, Thomas ; Bashir, Mohammed ; El Hajj, Nady ; Alam, Tanvir
